title: North Country National Scenic Trail: Cooperating Association
body: Cooperating Association         Volunteer working on segment of North Country National scenic Trail Bill Menke  The North Country Trail Association is a 501(c)3 not-for-profit organization whose mission is to build and maintain the North Country National Scenic Trail and tell its story. You can help support the North Country Trail by joining the North Country Trail Association or any of it's affiliated organizations.   You may also contribute funds to the North Country Trail Association. Donations are tax deductible and help us put tools in the hands of volunteers who are working hard to build and maintain the trail.  Your contributions will help the North Country Trail Association spread the word about the North Country Trail, by promoting the cultural, ecological, natural and historic values of this great national treasure.  Donate to the North Country Trail Association
